channel.title: Server crash
channel.description:
ok my server keeps messing up then it says that people already online
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.berserk(client.java:181) at client.AttackNPC(client.java:27527) at client.process(client.java:16390) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:55)

item.title: Server crash
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Means that something you did is crashing the server, then not letting them back online.

Oh, wait a sec, looks like someones trying to attack a un-attackable npc.

Read full topic
